# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment-1.1.0-20170118.041109-21.zip" && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8483
RUN echo Open-O nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment-1.1.0-20170118.041109-21.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
